Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
-- Update Oxapay configuration in payment_gateways
UPDATE payment_gateways 
SET 
  api_secret = NULL, -- Remove fake api_secret (not needed for Oxapay merchant API)
  webhook_url = ''https://backend.jackpotx.net/api/payment/webhook/oxapay'',
  webhook_secret = NULL, -- Oxapay doesn''t use webhook secrets
  config = jsonb_build_object(
    ''invoice_lifetime'', 60,
    ''fee_paid_by_payer'', 0,
    ''under_paid_coverage'', 5.00,
    ''payout_api_endpoint'', ''https://app-api.oxapay.com/v1''
  )
WHERE code = ''oxapay'';

-- Verify the update
SELECT 
  code,
  api_endpoint,
  api_key,
  api_secret,
  webhook_url,
  webhook_secret,
  config
FROM payment_gateways 
WHERE code = ''oxapay'';
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "
-- Update Oxapay with REAL API keys
UPDATE payment_gateways 
SET 
  api_key = ''SHJOUV-LFTNOS-4EKBNU-AXKM7Q'',
  payout_api_key = ''0DBSZS-3MGDAT-HV7PEL-ABHMGP'',
  is_active = true
WHERE code = ''oxapay'';

-- Verify the update
SELECT 
  id,
  code,
  name,
  api_endpoint,
  api_key,
  payout_api_key,
  webhook_url,
  is_active,
  supported_currencies,
  min_amount,
  max_amount
FROM payment_gateways 
WHERE code = ''oxapay'';
")
